it_IT {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "L.",
            "ITL ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Italian locale for Italy" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "Sankt J\u00F8rgens Alle 8, DK-1615 K\u00F8benhavn V, Danmark" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Italian" }
        Territory { "Italy" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[sSyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            "",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,#0.##;-#,#0.##",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.#;-\u00A4 #,##0.#",
            "#,#0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "39" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "dd/MMMM/yyyy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yyyy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "dom",
                            "lun",
                            "mar",
                            "mer",
                            "gio",
                            "ven",
                            "sab",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "domenica",
                            "luned\u00EC",
                            "marted\u00EC",
                            "mercoled\u00EC",
                            "gioved\u00EC",
                            "venerd\u00EC",
                            "sabato",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "gen",
                            "feb",
                            "mar",
                            "apr",
                            "mag",
                            "giu",
                            "lug",
                            "ago",
                            "set",
                            "ott",
                            "nov",
                            "dic",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "gennaio",
                            "febbraio",
                            "marzo",
                            "aprile",
                            "maggio",
                            "giugno",
                            "luglio",
                            "agosto",
                            "settembre",
                            "ottobre",
                            "novembre",
                            "dicembre",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
